# Zgoda, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship

Zgoda  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Braniewo, within Braniewo County, Warmian-Masurian Voivodeship, in northern Poland, close to the border with the Kaliningrad Oblast of Russia. It lies approximately  north of Braniewo and  north-west of the regional capital Olsztyn.
